imdb.title: Wakaba Girl
imdb.plot: Wakaba Kohashi, a sheltered rich girl, dreams of becoming a fashionable and trendy gyaru because she admires their outgoing and carefree nature. With this goal in mind, Wakaba begins the school year hoping to make her high school ...

episodes.title: My Dream Is to Be a High School Girl
episodes.plot: Upon starting high school, Wakaba Kohashi, a rich girl wishing to be a gyaru, makes friends with her classmates Moeko Tokita, Mao Kurokawa, and Nao Hashiba.

episodes.title: In a D-cup, Please
episodes.plot: Wakaba becomes excited about going to get ice cream with her new friends.

episodes.title: The Road to Becoming a Gyaru Is Long
episodes.plot: Wakaba buys a galge under the impression that it is a game for gyaru, with Nao lending her one of her own games.

episodes.title: So This Is a Knife
episodes.plot: Wakaba and the others go to Moeko's house, where they decide to make some cupcakes.

episodes.title: Rich Girls Are Not Fair
episodes.plot: Mao feels downhearted when a boy she kind of has a crush on appears to be interested in a girl from a rich school, so she decides to observe Wakaba in order to pick up her rich girl mannerisms.

episodes.title: The Area of Fabric Is Too Small
episodes.plot: The girls go to the pool together, with Wakaba borrowing a swimsuit from Moeko.

episodes.title: A Sniper, by Any Chance?
episodes.plot: The girls manage to convince Wakaba's mother to let Wakaba attend the festival with them, allowing them to enjoy the stalls and fireworks.

episodes.title: Bang Bang Bang
episodes.plot: Wakaba's class prepares a play for the upcoming culture festival while Nao sets her sights on the beauty pageant.

episodes.title: Wakaba-chan Fever
episodes.plot: Nao catches a fever on the day of the culture festival, so Wakaba takes her place in the beauty pageant.

episodes.title: That's Impossible
episodes.plot: Moeko attempts to overcome her struggles with sports by trying to perform a back hip circle on a bar.

episodes.title: A Machine for Generating Lazy People
episodes.plot: The girls have a sleepover at Moeko's place during New Year's so Wakaba can have her first shrine visit with her friends.

episodes.title: Stop with Those Eyes
episodes.plot: Wakaba worries that she might be moving abroad with her family, so the others try and convince them to stay.

episodes.title: I Want To Go to the Hot Springs
episodes.plot: Wanting to go to a hot spring inn, the girls get a part-time job at a family restaurant run by Wakaba's older sister.
